text: Redneck () is a 1973 British Italian crime thriller movie directed by Silvio Narizzano and starring Franco Nero, Telly Savalas, Mark Lester, Ely Galleani, Duilio Del Prete, Maria Michi. == Other websites == * Category:1973 crime movies Category:1973 thriller movies Category:British crime movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Silvio Narizzano
title: Redneck (movie)
